${ModID}:Clownfish.NAME: Clownfish
${ModID}:Clownfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Guppy.NAME: Guppy
${ModID}:Guppy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hammerhead.NAME: Hammerhead
${ModID}:Hammerhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Orca.NAME: Orca
${ModID}:Orca.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Orca.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Retain. NL Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Piranha.NAME: Piranha
${ModID}:Piranha.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Qwilfish.NAME: Qwilfish
${ModID}:Qwilfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SeaMonster.NAME: Sea Monster
${ModID}:SeaMonster.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Attacks into your hand. They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SeaMonster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Upgraded Attacks into your hand. They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Shark.NAME: Shark
${ModID}:Shark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Siren.NAME: Siren
${ModID}:Siren.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CastLine.NAME: Cast Line
${ModID}:CastLine.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile. Draw a card.

${ModID}:SetSail.NAME: Set Sail
${ModID}:SetSail.DESCRIPTION: Can't be upgraded. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:MopUp.NAME: Mop Up
${ModID}:MopUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL If it's a Curse or Status, gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:Sunhat.NAME: Sunhat
${ModID}:Sunhat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove your Weak.

${ModID}:ThatsAllFolks.NAME: That's All, Folks!
${ModID}:ThatsAllFolks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this is the only card in your hand, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:ScavengedShield.NAME: Scavenged Shield
${ModID}:ScavengedShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Voyaged: Gain !B! Block again.

${ModID}:Wander.NAME: Wander
${ModID}:Wander.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard your hand, then draw !M! card.
${ModID}:Wander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard your hand, then draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:BagOfDefends.NAME: Bag of Defends
${ModID}:BagOfDefends.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL When you remove a Defend from your deck, Upgrade this.

${ModID}:Oblivious.NAME: Oblivious
${ModID}:Oblivious.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 ${ModID}:Fish into your hand.
${ModID}:Oblivious.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 Upgraded ${ModID}:Fish into your hand.

${ModID}:SpoilerAlert.NAME: Spoiler Alert
${ModID}:SpoilerAlert.DESCRIPTION: Scry X. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.
${ModID}:SpoilerAlert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry X+1. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:SelfImprovement.NAME: Self Improvement
${ModID}:SelfImprovement.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Upgrade it and give it Retain this combat. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SelfImprovement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Upgrade it and give it Retain this combat.

${ModID}:HunkerDown.NAME: Hunker Down
${ModID}:HunkerDown.DESCRIPTION: Discard a random card. NL Gain [E].

${ModID}:NostalgicStrike.NAME: Nostalgic Strike
${ModID}:NostalgicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:FutureProofing.NAME: Future Proofing
${ModID}:FutureProofing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL Upgrade th top card of your draw pile this combat.

${ModID}:CardboardBullets.NAME: Cardboard Bullets
${ModID}:CardboardBullets.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the total cost of cards in your hand. NL X counts as 4.
${ModID}:CardboardBullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal damage equal to the total cost of cards in your hand. NL X counts as 4.

${ModID}:FeedingFrenzy.NAME: Feeding Frenzy
${ModID}:FeedingFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all ${ModID}:Fish in your hand and draw pile. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each.

${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.NAME: Catch of the Day
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Baited.NAME: Baited
${ModID}:Baited.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a ${ModID}:Fish into your hand. NL If the enemy intends to attack, add !M! more.

${ModID}:AllOut.NAME: All Out
${ModID}:AllOut.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if your hand is empty, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:GarlicClove.NAME: Garlic Clove
${ModID}:GarlicClove.DESCRIPTION: Remove your Vulnerable and Frail. NL If you're not a Vampire, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RingTheBell.NAME: Ring the Bell
${ModID}:RingTheBell.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 13 HP. NL Put a *Curse *of *the *Bell on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:BigHaul.NAME: Big Haul
${ModID}:BigHaul.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your hand with Retain. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Bobber.NAME: Bobber
${ModID}:Bobber.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If you draw this during your turn, gain !B! Block and !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Tackle Box.NAME: Tackle Box
${ModID}:Tackle Box.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! Colorless card.
${ModID}:Tackle Box.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! Colorless cards.

${ModID}:BombFishing.NAME: Bomb Fishing
${ModID}:BombFishing.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle one *Surprise! and !M! *Dazed* into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Surprise.NAME: Surprise!
${ModID}:Surprise.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. When this card is drawn, deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Harpoon.NAME: Harpoon
${ModID}:Harpoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fatal: At the start of next combat, shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WakaWaka.NAME: Waka Waka
${ModID}:WakaWaka.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Startup: Shuffle 2 *Power *Pellets into your draw pile.
${ModID}:WakaWaka.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Startup: Shuffle 2 *Power *Pellets into your draw pile.

${ModID}:ManifestMeal.NAME: Manifest Meal
${ModID}:ManifestMeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Food with X+1 into your hand.

${ModID}:Food.NAME: Food
${ModID}:Food.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain X [E]. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Food.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain X [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cannoneer.NAME: Cannoneer
${ModID}:Cannoneer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

${ModID}:BootsSequence.NAME: Boots Sequence
${ModID}:BootsSequence.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! *Boots on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BootsSequence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! *Boots on top of your draw pile. NL Draw 1 additional card next turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.NAME: Discover a Crate
${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.DESCRIPTION: Add *Smite and *Safety into your hand. ${ModID}:Voyaged: Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add *Smite and *Safety into your hand. ${ModID}:Voyaged: Upgrade them.

${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.NAME: Blood in the Water
${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Consume. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Gain 1 additional Strength for each ${ModID}:Fish consumed to play this.
${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${ModID}:Consume. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Gain 1 additional Strength for each ${ModID}:Fish consumed to play this.

${ModID}:SupplyTrip.NAME: Supply Trip
${ModID}:SupplyTrip.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you have !M! in your hand. NL Gain !B! Block for each card drawn.

${ModID}:TreasureChest.NAME: Treasure Chest
${ModID}:TreasureChest.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Whaling.NAME: Whaling
${ModID}:Whaling.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL If you have over 200 Gold, spend 15 to gain an extra 1 Strength.
${ModID}:Whaling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL If you have over 200 Gold, spend 15 to gain an extra 1 Strength.

${ModID}:Reserves.NAME: Reserves
${ModID}:Reserves.DESCRIPTION: After you play a cost X card, gain [E].

${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.NAME: X Marks the Spot
${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.DESCRIPTION: Add a random cost X card from another class into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random cost X card from another class into your hand. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
